channel.title: [PI] Stances [Rep ++]
channel.description:
I heard setting up weapons stances is server-sided. Even if its Client-sided...please tell me how to make my chaotic maul look right...the player wields it with one hand. :(
I'll [Rep ++] for your help.

and look for this

public void getPlayerAnimIndex(String weaponName){
under it add something like this if(weaponName.contains("@@@@")) { //name of item c.playerStandIndex = ANIMID; c.playerWalkIndex = ANIMID; c.playerRunIndex = ANIMID; return; }

the attack emote

public int getWepAnim(String weaponName) {
copy and paste one of the codes from there should work....
